tool_assessments.risk_summary: Read contents from files and URLs, supports PDF, Excel, DOCX, images. Partial reading with offset/length.
Write or append to file contents. Supports text, Excel, DOCX creation.
Apply surgical edits to files using find/replace. Supports text, Excel, DOCX.
Read contents of multiple files simultaneously.
Create a new directory or ensure a directory exists.
Get detailed listing of all files and directories with depth control.
Move or rename files and directories.
Retrieve detailed metadata about a file or directory.
Start a new terminal process with intelligent state detection. Primary tool for executing commands and running code.
Send input to a running process and receive the response. Used for REPL interaction.
Read output from a running process with pagination.
Force terminate a running terminal session.
List all running processes with CPU and memory usage.
Terminate a running process by PID.
Start a streaming file or content search with progressive results.
Get more results from an active search with pagination.
Create a new PDF file or modify an existing one from markdown content.
